effect.sun-moon: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

short_effect.sun-moon: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
